title: Flip - The Weight of the World
Day In The City 4
description:
The Day in the City series was, to our knowledge, the inaugural modern day video comp. Conceived and produced by Urb-Orbis it is a format that has been copied by several sports over the years.

The concept aim was to show both the skills of the skaters and the filmers without having the pressure or steer of funding partners, allowing all the competitors to experiment and show their full talent.

The resulting films were put onto DVD (with the exception of DITC1 which was VHS) and cover mounted on UK title Sidewalk Surfer and then on Kingpin alongside the distribution of the project’s sponsors. To this day we believe it was the biggest distribution of a hard copy skate film in the UK at around 50,000.

title: Zoo York - The Chaz Ortiz Video
description:
ZOO YORK proudly presents, The Chaz Ortiz Video. Filmed in 10 months between October 2011 to July 2012. Shot on location in Chicago, Atlanta, Boston, Miami, New York City and more.
Chaz has been a part of the ZOO YORK family since he was nine years old. True to the heritage of ZOO, our boy seriously holds it down in the streets.
